posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Cobb "Bat On Shoulder" Version - Doesn't need to be graded
posts.post_content: As it states, I don't need it to be graded, just authentic.  Looking for Good to VG condition.  Please let me know what is out there.  I can pay immediately.
